preqs: ATS2113 or placement test or unit coordinator's permission.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ATS2113, INM2030}
(Must have passed a unit in {ATS2113} or  Permission required)

unitName: Indonesian 4: Stories and storytelling in the Indonesian archipelago
description: The unit develops Indonesian language skills and cultural knowledge through the use of both traditional and contemporary story techniques. It considers both oral and written traditions utilizing, songs, poetry, folk tales and literature.
